definition: late Tang period (9th century)
Tang dynasty (618-907)/surname Tang
to exaggerate/empty/in vain/old variant of 螗[tang2]
tip/end/final stage/latter part/inessential detail/powder/dust/opera role of old man

sentences.english: Since the late Tang and Northern Song Dynasties, people have begun to call Wei Yingwu the poet of landscape and pastoral.
sentences.chinese: 自唐末北宋以來，人們開始稱韋應物爲山水田園詩人。

sentences.english: The second phase was from the peak to late Tang period when landscape wash painting grew up.
sentences.chinese: 第二階段是盛唐以後至唐末，水墨山水畫崛起。

sentences.english: The structure of Jingnan separatist rule in the Late Tang Dynasty is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論唐末靜南軍鎮的政治架構。

sentences.english: To the late Tang and Five Dynasties, Zhouqu Tibetan sphere of influence is still habitat.
sentences.chinese: 唐末至五代，舟曲境仍在吐蕃勢力範圍。

sentences.english: The establishment of the Houliang Dynasty marks some unity of situation of the chaotic in the Late Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 後梁的建立，標誌着唐末的混亂局面已走向部分統一。

sentences.english: The secluded life of poet Fang Gan in the late Tang Dynasty is closely connected with his literary writing.
sentences.chinese: 唐末詩人方乾的隱居生活與其創作具有密切的關係。

sentences.english: The Tang end Five Dynasties, the Quanzhou port often had the flourishing ship intercourse.
sentences.chinese: 唐末五代，泉州港已不時有蕃舶往來。

sentences.english: The establishment of Later Liang marked the end of the chaotic situation of Late Tang dynasty and the beginning of unification.
sentences.chinese: 後梁的建立，標誌着唐末的混亂局面已走向部分統一。

sentences.english: The late Tang Dynasty is an extraordinarily dark age in Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 唐末是中國歷史上一個極爲黑暗的時期。

sentences.english: In the north, there are from the late Tang Jing Hao into Girder of landscape painters.
sentences.chinese: 在北方，有由唐末入後梁的山水畫家荊浩。

sentences.english: In the period of five dynasties and ten states, the military governorship of late Tang dynasty continued to develop.
sentences.chinese: 五代十國時期是唐末藩鎮割據的繼續和發展。

sentences.english: The Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period is the continuation and development of the Late Tang Dynasty opposite to the splittism.
sentences.chinese: 五代十國時期是唐末藩鎮割據的繼續和發展。

sentences.english: In the late Tang Dynasty, many poets chose to work in the imperial government.
sentences.chinese: 入幕是唐末詩人的生存狀態之一。

definition: Huang Chao peasant uprising 875-884 in late Tang, led by Huang Chao
Five Dynasties (907-960) and Ten Kingdoms (902-979), period of political turmoil in ancient China
last years of the Sui dynasty/early 7th century AD
late Tang peasant uprising 875-884 led by Huang Chao
Later Tang of the Five Dynasties (923-936)
Northern and Southern dynasties (420-589)
final years of Yuan dynasty (1279-1368)/mid 14th century
Tang dynasty (618-907)
early years
An-Shi Rebellion (755-763) of 安祿山|安禄山[An1 Lu4 shan1] and 史思明[Shi3 Si1 ming2], a catastrophic setback for Tang dynasty
Sui (581-617) and Tang dynasties (618-907)
Emperor Zhaozong of Tang, reign name of twentieth Tang emperor 李曄|李晔[Li1 Ye4] (867-904), reigned 888-904

Tang of the Five Southern Dynasties 937-975
Southern Dynasties (420-589)
